front.title: A Quick Crash Detection Method for IKE

abstract.t: This document describes an extension to the IKEv2 protocol that allows for faster crash recovery using a saved token. When an IPsec tunnel between two IKEv2 implementations is disconnected due to a restart of one peer, it can take as much as several minutes for the other peer to discover that the reboot has occurred, thus delaying recovery. In this text we propose an extension to the protocol, that allows for recovery within a few seconds of the reboot.
